price: Sigurisht që atyre u kanë ardhur histori për t’i prapësuar (nga e keqja),
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāahum mina al-anbāi mā fīhi muz'dajarun
